name: Basic Protection Plan
coverage_description: Covers manufacturer defects and hardware failures. Does not cover accidental damage.

name: Standard Protection Plan
coverage_description: Covers manufacturer defects and hardware failures for 2 years. Includes 24/7 tech support.

name: Premium Protection Plan
coverage_description: Covers manufacturer defects and hardware failures for 3 years. Includes accidental damage from handling (ADH) and 24/7 premium tech support.

name: Total Tech Support
coverage_description: Unlimited tech support for all your devices plus coverage for one product. Includes in-home service.

name: TV Protection Plan 2-Year
coverage_description: Covers screen defects power surges and component failures for your Samsung QLED TV.

name: OLED Care Plan 3-Year
coverage_description: Specialized coverage for OLED burn-in panel defects and component failures.

name: Sony Extended Care
coverage_description: Premium coverage including accidental damage for your Sony Bravia XR.

name: AppleCare+ for iPhone
coverage_description: Apple-certified repairs unlimited incidents of accidental damage with service fees.

name: Samsung Care+
coverage_description: Covers mechanical breakdown and accidental damage with low deductibles.

name: AppleCare+ for Mac
coverage_description: Apple-certified repairs and priority access to Apple experts.

name: ThinkPad Premier Support
coverage_description: On-site next-business-day repair and 24/7 technical support.

name: ASUS Premium Care
coverage_description: Extended coverage for your gaming laptop including accidental damage.

name: AppleCare+ for Headphones
coverage_description: Coverage for your AirPods Max with battery service.

name: Sony Protection Plus
coverage_description: Extended warranty coverage for your Sony headphones.

name: Arlo Secure Plus
coverage_description: Extended device warranty plus premium cloud storage for all cameras.
